greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = lcm(n, A003415(n)).
link: Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[LCM[n, If[Abs@ n < 2, 0, n Total[#2/#1 & @@@ FactorInteger[Abs@ n]]]], {n, 59}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Feb 05 2017, after _Michael Somos_ at A003415 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = lcm(n, sum(i=1, #f=factor(n)~, n/f[1, i]*f[2, i]) ); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Dec 11 2013
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Jul 23 2003
